data.author: John Clute

changelog.release_notes: Compiled for all watch types, needed to change the spacing bluetooth indicator and time since last charge.  Instead of using bl for bluetooth, it is now, b, and the time indicator is moved over to the left.  The pebble round is some what funky in the display, however, it is all there and fits on the bottom line.  On both the pebble and pebble time, it looks pretty cool.  In the future will center the display better for the round.

data.description:
Informational Watch face:
Informr, was built with the idea of giving the user a simplistic view of their time piece.  Let a person know what they need to know and nothing more.  As for other information that is what watch apps do.
Line 1: Battery life, written as numeric of percentages
Line 2: Time
Line 3: Date
Line 4: b - Bluetooth connection, and Duration since last battery charge.

latest_release.release_notes: Compiled for all watch types, needed to change the spacing bluetooth indicator and time since last charge.  Instead of using bl for bluetooth, it is now, b, and the time indicator is moved over to the left.  The pebble round is some what funky in the display, however, it is all there and fits on the bottom line.  On both the pebble and pebble time, it looks pretty cool.  In the future will center the display better for the round.

data.title: Informr
